room_title: Escape room "Casino Takeover" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: Place is a joke. Wooden slot machines and nothing but combination locks. Room was reset improperly and affected gameplay. Getting really tired of garbage generic games and rooms like this

room_title: Escape room "Casino Takeover" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: Went with a group of 12 and split up to do the Casino rooms. It was fun but they need more than one person helping with clues as the other team would be calling about a clue the same time we were and one team would have to hold. I liked the concept and the staff was overall nice and helpful.

room_title: Escape room "Casino Takeover" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: I'm an escape room fanatic and ESCAPEability is by far my favorite! I loved the Casino Takeover room. It truly represents old Vegas and the mobster days! We had a big group so we were able to compete against each other in similar rooms split with a window. The room was tough, but the experience was so unique that it was totally worth it!I have recommended this place to all of my friends and will definitely be back!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Takeover" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: I planned a surprise birthday thing at this place for my husband and they were awesome about everything and worked with me on making sure this was a great surprise. We did the Casino Takeover room and it was so hard but sooo much fun.

room_title: Escape room "Casino Takeover" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: Really great setup!!! Super fun, people were VERY friendly! Much more organized and professional than other escape rooms in vegas! I was very impressed!

room_title: Escape room "Casino Takeover" by ESCAPEability in Las Vegas
review: Great birthday party, thanks to ESCAPEability! They were very accommodating and helped me arrange the whole thing. We battled each other in the Casino Takeover. Can't wait to go back and try other rooms.
